passive.name: Refraction of Sightline
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and increases Outgoing Healing by an amount that is equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Effect RES. Outgoing Healing can be increased this way by up to <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
